items.title: Tech Executives Are Starting to Talk Tariffs. What It May Mean for Apple, Amazon Earnings.
items.description: Amazon, Apple, Meta, and Microsoft will need to address tariffs on earnings calls next week. Tech executives are sounding alarms.

items.title: Now Streaming: Analysts boost Netflix targets after Q1 beat
items.description: “Now Streaming” is The Fly’s weekly recap of the stories surrounding the biggest content streamers. PLAYING THIS WEEKEND: Among this weekend’s highly-anticipated new streaming content is the first few episodes of “Andor,” a drama series set in the “Star Wars” universe, on Disney+ (DIS). Meanwhile, Netflix (NFLX) subscribers can catch the fifth season of drama series “You,” as well as neo-noir action thriller film “Havoc,” starring Tom Hardy and Forest Whitaker.
